channel.title: Mysql Server (highscores to)
channel.description:
What i Did 1/19/09 - Added Player Faceing 1/19/09 - Fully Working Mysql HighScores (online) 1/19/09 - added mysql shop items loading 1/19/09 - added mysql item loading 1/19/09 - added mysql npc spawn loading 1/19/09 - added mysql npc loading 1/19/09 - added mysql npc drops loading 1/18/09 - Cooking Handeled (client 160 kb) 1/18/09 - Cleaned Client Only 163kb
All This Below Credits to Fox2007 * Removed Thread-Per-Client * Invalid Name Protection * Saving + Loading to text files (.txt) * Graham's EventManager * A fix for looping emotes * ActionButton Handler * Weapon Animations Handler * Save/LoadHandlers * Command Manager* * In-Game Item Searching * Account Configuration (type ::config) * Equipment Bonuses * Most Equipment in Right Slots * Added 5 Custom Shops * Custom Levelup Interfaces (very clean!) * Perfect picking up ground items * Added new players online menu * Client.java is only 166KB, Entire folder is 1.8MB * Full IPBanning System with Command * Cooking over Fires * Theiving Chests * Full Woodcutting * Full Mining * Basic Teleporting (no GFX or Emote) * Login / Logout Messages * Fedexer's Global Objects * Starter Equipment (:tarter) * Ability to change Emote Tab** (tabswitch) * Silab Compatible * Open Source
Download: http://rapidshare.com/files/186274102/Blank_Sql.rar
simply edit server.java to set the database info

  • ActionButton Handler
